items.question: What am I able to track in WaitQ?
items.answer: WaitQ tracks guest counts, wait times, no-show rates, party sizes, peak hours, staff performance, and more. All data is available in real-time dashboards and historical reports.

items.question: Who has access to my analytics dashboard?
items.answer: Account admins and managers can access analytics. You can configure role-based permissions to control who sees what data.

items.question: Do you track real-time or historical data?
items.answer: Both! Live dashboards show current queue status, while historical reports let you analyze trends over days, weeks, or months.

items.question: Can I filter wait metrics by day, hour, or service period?
items.answer: Yes. Filter by any time range, day of week, hour, or custom service periods (lunch, dinner, etc.). Compare periods side-by-side.

items.question: Does analytics require POS integrations?
items.answer: No. WaitQ analytics work standalone using your waitlist data. POS integration is optional and can add revenue correlation if desired.
